decisions.name: Check_Skip_Component_Issue_Non_Serial
decisions.label: Check Skip Component Issue - Non Serial

decisions.description: If there is more than 100 records, apex code will invoke. otherwise flow will handle the work order issue
decisions.name: checking_limitations
decisions.label: checking limitations

dynamicChoiceSets.name: Component_Serials_Lot
dynamicChoiceSets.filterLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND 9 AND 10 AND 11 AND ( 12 OR 13 ) )

fields.name: Component_Issue_SYDATA_Result
fields.fieldText:
SYDATA: {!GET_SYDATA.Name}

Status: {!GET_SYDATA.rstk__sydata_process__c}

Qty Issued: {!IssuedQty_Text}

fields.fieldText: Click Next to issue another component.

fields.fieldText: Do you wish to perform issue on pending components?

fields.fieldText: Click Next to issue another component.

fields.fieldText: No more components are available to issue, Please click 'Next' to end the flow.

fields.fieldText: Do you wish to perform issue on pending components?

fields.name: Success_notes_to_issue
fields.fieldText: Note : Click 'Next' without selecting the above checkbox to end the flow

fields.name: Component_Info
fields.fieldText:
Component Item: {!WOORDDMD.rstk__woorddmd_compitem__r.rstk__icitem_item__r.rstk__peitem_item__c}

Quantity Required: {!QtyReq_Text}

Quantity Issued: {!QtyIss_Text}

Quantity Remaining: {!QtyRem_Text}

Lot Tracked: {!Lot_Tracked_Comp}

Serial Tracked: {!Serial_Tracked_Comp}

value.stringValue: rstk__iclocitem_div__c = '{!WOORDDMD.rstk__woorddmd_div__c}' AND rstk__iclocitem_site__c = '{!WOORDDMD.rstk__woorddmd_site__c}' AND rstk__iclocitem_proj__c = '{!WOORDDMD.rstk__woorddmd_issproj__c}' AND rstk__iclocitem_locqty__c > 0 AND rstk__iclocitem_availind__c = true AND rstk__iclocitem_icitemsrl__c = NULL AND rstk__iclocitem_iccontainer__c = NULL

fields.name: Loc_Not_Selected_Error
fields.fieldText: Please select an inventory location to issue from

fields.fieldText: Quantity To Issue

fields.fieldText: Please enter a valid quantity to issue.

fields.fieldText: Txn Comments

fields.fieldText: Allow Over-Issue

Serial Tracked: {!Serial_Tracked_Comp}

value.stringValue: rstk__sylocid_site__c = '{!WOORDDMD.rstk__woorddmd_site__c}' AND ( rstk__sylocid_loctype_pl__c = 'On Hand' OR rstk__sylocid_loctype_pl__c = 'Consigned' )

value.stringValue: Select a Work Order to process:
(rstk__wocst_disassmind__c = FALSE AND rstk__wocst_numbops__c > 0 AND rstk__wocst_ordsts__c IN ('5','7','8'))
